import React, { Component } from 'react'; import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import '../App.css' import {Collapse} from 'reactstrap'; import logo from "./aaaaa.PNG" import phone from './phone.png' import down from './down.png' class header extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = {open: false} this.home = this.home.bind(this) this.show = this.show.bind(this) this.service = this.service.bind(this) this.about = this.about.bind(this) } show() { return ( this.setState({ open: !this.state.open }) ) } home() { window.location.replace("/#home") this.setState({ open: !this.state.open }) } service() { window.location.replace("/#services") this.setState({ open: !this.state.open }) } about() { window.location.replace("/#about") this.setState({ open: !this.state.open }) } render() { return (

); } } export default header;
